original_text: For I have derived much joy and comfort from your love, my brother, because the hearts of the saints have been refreshed through you.
korean_text: 형제여 성도들의 마음이 너로 말미암아 평안함을 얻었으니 내가 너의 사랑으로 많은 기쁨과 위로를 받았노라

sentences.original_text: For I have derived much joy and comfort from your love
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 사랑으로 내가 큰 기쁨과 위로를 얻었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: because the hearts of the saints have been refreshed
